verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Melkonumaa melkonumaa Yese nudivenu O priyudaa melkonumaa melkonumaa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nammajaala mee lokamunu Nee jeeva mepaatidi Samasthambu vyardhambegaa Praardhinchu maa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thappudu bodhalanundi Bhadra parachu konumu neevu Eppudu prabhu istahmunu Neraverchu maa{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aaveshamu vyardhambegaa Pravarthimpaku dambamugaa Ahankaara garvamu nundi Thappinchuko{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu sheeghramugaa vachchu Yeduru chooda valenu neevu Bhaasuramugaa thanatho Vella siddha padumaa{/lang-eng}
